title: Telegram's Durov arrested as part of cyber crime investigation, says Paris prosecutor
description: The probe concerns crimes related to illicit transactions, child pornography, fraud and the refusal to communicate information to authorities, the prosecutor said.
content: Telegram CEO Pavel Durov was arrested on Saturday and is being held in custody as part of a cyber criminality investigation, the Paris prosecutor said in a statement on Monday. The probe concerns crimes related to illicit transactions, child pornography, fraud and the refusal to communicate information to authorities, the prosecutor said.
